Docs.summary: A representation of settings that apply to a collection of similarly themed notifications.

remarks.para: A representation of settings that apply to a collection of similarly themed notifications.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Sub New (id As String, name As ICharSequence, importance As NotificationImportance)
public: NotificationChannel(System::String ^ id, Java::Lang::ICharSequence ^ name, Android::App::NotificationImportance importance);
public NotificationChannel (string? id, Java.Lang.ICharSequence? name, Android.App.NotificationImportance importance);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string id, class Java.Lang.ICharSequence name, valuetype Android.App.NotificationImportance importance) cil managed
new Android.App.NotificationChannel : string * Java.Lang.ICharSequence * Android.App.NotificationImportance -> Android.App.NotificationChannel

Docs.param: The id of the channel. Must be unique per package. The value may be truncated if it is too long.

The user visible name of the channel. You can rename this channel when the system locale changes by listening for the Intent#ACTION_LOCALE_CHANGED broadcast. The recommended maximum length is 40 characters; the value may be truncated if it is too long.
The importance of the channel. This controls how interruptive notifications posted to this channel are.
Docs.summary: Creates a notification channel.

remarks.para: Creates a notification channel.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Blockable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Blockable : bool with get, set

Docs.param: if true, allows users to block notifications on this channel.
Docs.summary: Returns whether this channel is always blockable, even if the app is 'fixed' as non-blockable. -or- Allows users to block notifications sent through this channel, if this channel belongs to a package that otherwise would have notifications "fixed" as enabled.

remarks.para: Property getter documentation:
Returns whether this channel is always blockable, even if the app is 'fixed' as non-blockable.
Property setter documentation:
Allows users to block notifications sent through this channel, if this channel belongs to a package that otherwise would have notifications "fixed" as enabled.
If the channel does not belong to a package that has a fixed notification permission, this method does nothing, since such channels are blockable by default and cannot be set to be unblockable.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The id of the default channel for an app.

remarks.para: The id of the default channel for an app. This id is reserved by the system. All notifications posted from apps targeting android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES#N_MR1 or earlier without a notification channel specified are posted to this channel.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the user visible description of this channel. -or- Sets the user visible description of this channel.

remarks.para: Property getter documentation:
Returns the user visible description of this channel.
Property setter documentation:
Sets the user visible description of this channel.
The recommended maximum length is 300 characters; the value may be truncated if it is too long.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST.

remarks.para: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST. Include to show fields that have to do with editing conversation settings (demoting or restoring a channel to be a Conversation, changing bubble behavior, or setting the priority of a conversation).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST.

remarks.para: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST. Include to show fields that have to do with editing importance (#setImportance(int)) and/or conversation priority.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST.

remarks.para: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST. Include to show fields that have to do with editing launcher behavior (showing badges)}.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST.

remarks.para: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST. Include to show fields that have to do with editing behavior on devices that are locked or have a turned off display (#setLockscreenVisibility(int), #enableLights(boolean), #setLightColor(int)).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST.

remarks.para: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST. Include to show fields that have to do with editing sound, like a tone picker (#setSound(Uri, AudioAttributes)).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST.

remarks.para: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST. Include to show fields that have to do with editing vibration (#enableVibration(boolean), #setVibrationPattern(long[])).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST.

remarks.para: Extra value for Settings#EXTRA_CHANNEL_FILTER_LIST. Include to show fields that have to do with editing do not disturb bypass {(
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

member this.Group : string with get, set

Docs.param: the id of a group created by NotificationManager#createNotificationChannelGroup(NotificationChannelGroup).
Docs.summary: Returns what group this channel belongs to. -or- Sets what group this channel belongs to.

remarks.para: Property getter documentation:
Returns what group this channel belongs to.
This is used only for visually grouping channels in the UI.
Property setter documentation:

Sets what group this channel belongs to.
Group information is only used for presentation, not for behavior.
Only modifiable before the channel is submitted to NotificationManager#createNotificationChannel(NotificationChannel), unless the channel is not currently part of a group.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Android::App::NotificationImportance Importance { Android::App::NotificationImportance get(); void set(Android::App::NotificationImportance value); };
member this.Importance : Android.App.NotificationImportance with get, set

Docs.param: the amount the user should be interrupted by notifications from this channel.
Docs.summary: Returns the user specified importance e. -or- Sets the level of interruption of this notification channel.

remarks.para: Property getter documentation:

Returns the user specified importance e.g. NotificationManager#IMPORTANCE_LOW for notifications posted to this channel. Note: This value might be > NotificationManager#IMPORTANCE_NONE, but notifications posted to this channel will not be shown to the user if the parent NotificationChannelGroup or app is blocked. See NotificationChannelGroup#isBlocked() and NotificationManager#areNotificationsEnabled().
Property setter documentation:

Sets the level of interruption of this notification channel.
Only modifiable before the channel is submitted to NotificationManager#createNotificationChannel(NotificationChannel).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsConversation As Boolean
public: property bool IsConversation { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Whether or not this channel represents a conversation.

remarks.para: Whether or not this channel represents a conversation.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDemoted As Boolean
public: property bool IsDemoted { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Returns whether the user has decided that this channel does not represent a conversation.

remarks.para: Returns whether the user has decided that this channel does not represent a conversation. The value will always be false for channels that never claimed to be conversations - that is, for channels where #getConversationId() and #getParentChannelId() are empty.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsImportantConversation As Boolean
public: property bool IsImportantConversation { bool get(); };

Docs.summary: Whether or not notifications in this conversation are considered important.

remarks.para: Whether or not notifications in this conversation are considered important.
Important conversations may get special visual treatment, and might be able to bypass DND.
This is only valid for channels that represent conversations, that is, where #isConversation() is true.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the notification light color for notifications posted to this channel. -or- Sets the notification light color for notifications posted to this channel, if lights are #enableLights(boolean) enabled on this channel and the device supports that feature.

Returns the notification light color for notifications posted to this channel. Irrelevant unless #shouldShowLights().

Sets the notification light color for notifications posted to this channel, if lights are #enableLights(boolean) enabled on this channel and the device supports that feature.

Docs.summary: Returns whether or not notifications posted to this channel are shown on the lockscreen in full or redacted form. -or- Sets whether notifications posted to this channel appear on the lockscreen or not, and if so, whether they appear in a redacted form.

remarks.para: Property getter documentation:
Returns whether or not notifications posted to this channel are shown on the lockscreen in full or redacted form.
Property setter documentation:

Sets whether notifications posted to this channel appear on the lockscreen or not, and if so, whether they appear in a redacted form. See e.g. Notification#VISIBILITY_SECRET.
Only modifiable by the system and notification ranker.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Sub SetConversationId (parentChannelId As String, conversationId As String)
public: void SetConversationId(System::String ^ parentChannelId, System::String ^ conversationId);
public void SetConversationId (string parentChannelId, string conversationId);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetConversationId(string parentChannelId, string conversationId) cil managed

Docs.param: The #getId() id} of the generic channel that notifications of this type would be posted to in absence of a specific conversation id. For example, if this channel represents 'Messages from Person A', the parent channel would be 'Messages.'
The ShortcutInfo#getId() of the shortcut representing this channel's conversation.

.method public hidebysig instance void SetSound(class Android.Net.Uri sound, class Android.Media.AudioAttributes audioAttributes) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the sound that should be played for notifications posted to this channel and its audio attributes.

remarks.para:
Sets the sound that should be played for notifications posted to this channel and its audio attributes. Notification channels with an #getImportance() importance of at least NotificationManager#IMPORTANCE_DEFAULT should have a sound.
Only modifiable before the channel is submitted to NotificationManager#createNotificationChannel(NotificationChannel).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetVibrationPattern(int64[] vibrationPattern) cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the vibration pattern for notifications posted to this channel.

remarks.para:
Sets the vibration pattern for notifications posted to this channel. If the provided pattern is valid (non-null, non-empty), will enable vibration on this channel (equivalent to calling #enableVibration(boolean) with true). Otherwise, vibration will be disabled unless #enableVibration(boolean) is used with true, in which case the default vibration will be used.
Only modifiable before the channel is submitted to NotificationManager#createNotificationChannel(NotificationChannel).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
